metadata.title: CVE-2024-49986 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:platform/x86: x86-android-tablets: Fix use after free onplatform_device_register() errorsx86_android_tablet_remove() frees the pdevs[] array, so it should notbe used after calling x86_android_tablet_remove().When platform_device_register() fails, store the pdevs[x] PTR_ERR() valueinto the local ret variable before calling x86_android_tablet_remove()to avoid using pdevs[] after it has been freed.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
